title: Recipe app
author: Ricardo Moreira
body:
# **What it is?**

A food app with node.js and Javascript( In progress) Created with bootstrap 3 (Will bre refactored to bootstrap 4) and MongoDB and Express.

User can create profile, add recipes to his profile and comment other recipE



## What I learned?

* Node.js
* Express
* MongoDB
* Bootstrap
